::DarkMouse::

She checked the scanners again.  She was having difficulty with the 
computer.  The comp was acting like it was hit with some type of 
scrambler or something.  Then she heard a noise come fron inside the 
console.  she bent down and opened a panel to see inside.  She shined 
a little light in the panel and saw a small rat chewing on the wires.
She smiled and picked up the rat.
"A rodent after my own spark." She smiled and put the small rat in a 
bucket and placed it next to her computer.  She started repairs.

She looked at the bucket, "When I'm done here my little friend, I'll 
make you a nice big cage to stay in.  I can always use a friend here."

She went back to fixing the wires.
